mapper.select: SELECT store_no ,store_name ,store_type ,store_business_no ,store_address_road ,store_address_detail ,store_latitude ,store_longitude ,store_phone_no ,store_charge_week ,store_charge_weekend ,store_description FROM store WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT store_image_no ,store_path_image FROM store_image WHERE store_no = #{storeNo} ORDER BY store_image_no DESC
SELECT store_image_no ,store_path_image FROM store_image WHERE store_image_no = #{storeImageNo}
SELECT store_reservation_time FROM reservation_time WHERE reservation_date_no = #{reservationDateNo} ORDER BY store_reservation_time ASC
SELECT store_reservation_total, store_reservation_max from reservation_date WHERE reservation_date_no = #{reservationDateNo}
SELECT owned_game_no ,store_no ,game_no FROM owned_game WHERE store_no = #{storeNo}

SELECT r.reservation_no ,TO_CHAR(store_reservation_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') store_reservation_date ,r.reservation_charge_people ,tg.times ,umrm.user_name ,umrm.user_phone_no ,r.reservation_status ,r.reservation_charge_total FROM reservation_date rd ,reservation r ,(SELECT u.user_name ,u.user_phone_no ,mrm.reservation_no FROM users u, (select DISTINCT m.user_no ,rm.reservation_no FROM reservation_member rm ,matching m WHERE rm.matching_no = m.matching_no) mrm WHERE u.user_no = mrm.user_no) umrm ,(SELECT rtgr.reservation_no ,MIN(rt.store_reservation_time) || ':00 ~ ' || MAX(rt.store_reservation_time) || ':00' as times FROM reservation_time rt ,(SELECT rtg.reservation_time_no ,r.reservation_no FROM reservation_time_group rtg ,reservation r WHERE rtg.reservation_no = r.reservation_no AND r.store_no = #{storeNo}) rtgr WHERE rt.reservation_time_no = rtgr.reservation_time_no GROUP BY rtgr.reservation_no) tg WHERE r.reservation_date_no = rd.reservation_date_no AND r.reservation_no = umrm.reservation_no AND r.reservation_no = tg.reservation_no
ORDER BY store_reservation_date ASC
ORDER BY store_reservation_date DESC

SELECT r.reservation_no ,TO_CHAR(store_reservation_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') store_reservation_date ,r.reservation_charge_people ,tg.times ,umrm.user_name ,umrm.user_phone_no ,r.reservation_status ,r.reservation_charge_total FROM reservation_date rd ,reservation r ,(SELECT u.user_name ,u.user_phone_no ,mrm.reservation_no FROM users u, (select DISTINCT m.user_no ,rm.reservation_no FROM reservation_member rm ,matching m WHERE rm.matching_no = m.matching_no) mrm WHERE u.user_no = mrm.user_no) umrm ,(SELECT rtgr.reservation_no ,MIN(rt.store_reservation_time) || ':00 ~ ' || MAX(rt.store_reservation_time) || ':00' as times FROM reservation_time rt ,(SELECT rtg.reservation_time_no ,r.reservation_no FROM reservation_time_group rtg ,reservation r WHERE rtg.reservation_no = r.reservation_no AND r.reservation_no = #{reservationNo}) rtgr WHERE rt.reservation_time_no = rtgr.reservation_time_no GROUP BY rtgr.reservation_no) tg WHERE r.reservation_date_no = rd.reservation_date_no AND r.reservation_no = umrm.reservation_no AND r.reservation_no = tg.reservation_no
